name: 3D Madness Enhanced 0.1
description:
3D Madness Enhanced is a 3D Platformer where you play as a ball as you go through four levels. The aim of the game is to collect tiny diamonds in order to break down the red doors that will block your path.

This is a updated version of "3D Madness" that fixes and improves on that game with better controls and better visuals.

The Controls are:

The Left, right, up and down keys are to move. 

Space bar to jump, and press. Space again in the air to stomp

You can look in all directions using the mouse 

Press ESC to pause

Press the Tab button to activate or deactivate the cursor.

Updates:

I gave the ball a speed cap so it is easier to change your direction

I gave the ball a charged dash. To use it, just hold down the left control button(Ctrl) and hold it down. The longer you hold it down, the further the ball will go
